subject: SIMPLE START - One Command
content:
Chad -

Use this ONE command to start everything:

```bash
cd ~/.openclaw/workspace && bash -c 'pkill -f sync; sleep 1; nohup ./sync/robust_sync.sh > logs/sync.log 2>&1 & nohup python3 sync/heartbeat.py > logs/heartbeat.log 2>&1 & nohup python3 sync/health_server.py > logs/health.log 2>&1 & nohup python3 sync/monitor.py > logs/monitor.log 2>&1 &' && sleep 3 && curl http://localhost:8080/health
```

Then send Telegram DM to Caleb.

- Helios
